mapper.select: SELECT userId, account, userName, su.createDate, phoneNumber FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_dept sd ON su.deptId = sd.deptId WHERE su.deptId = #{deptId} ORDER BY createDate LIMIT #{startNo},#{pageSize}

SELECT userId AS id, account, userName, password, type, deptId, su.companyId, roleId, phoneNumber, sc.auditing FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_company sc ON su.companyId = sc.companyId WHERE account = #{account}
